title: Efficiency in photocatalytic production of hydrogen: energetic and sustainability implications
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00361F, Perspective
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Rocío Sayago-Carro, Luis José Jiménez-Chavarriga, Esperanza Fernández-García, Anna Kubacka, Marcos Fernández-García
The efficiency of hydrogen generation through photocatalytic processes is analyzed from a dual perspective considering energetic and sustainability implications.
